## Pipeline arguments

nextflow run \
https://github.com/openpipelines-bio/openpipeline.git -r main_build \
-main-script target/nextflow/reference/make_reference/main.nf \
--help

## Table of arguments

| name                | type   | description                                                  |
|:--------------------|:-------|:-------------------------------------------------------------|
| --genome_fasta      | string | Reference genome fasta.                                      |
| --transcriptome_gtf | string | Reference transcriptome annotation.                          |
| --ercc              | string | ERCC sequence and annotation file.                           |
| --subset_regex      | string | Will subset the reference chromosomes using the given regex. |
| --output_fasta      | file   | Output genome sequence fasta.                                |
| --output_gtf        | file   | Output transcriptome annotation gtf.                         |
